pages.text: Death itself, straight from the other realm.

pages.title: Summoning Death
pages.description: $(italic)Death can be summoned while trying to bind with $(item)Rite of Binding$() too many spectral beings at once. If there are at least 5 $(item)Poltergeist$(), 5 $(item)Spectres$() and 5 $(item)Banshees$() nearby, the $(item)Fetish$() is destroyed and $(item)Death$() itself will be summoned.
pages._comment: Unlocked when the player summons Death

pages.title: Wearing Death
pages.description: If a player is wearing all of Death's outfit and wields a $(item)Hand of Death$(), that player will became Death itself, thus being summoned during such rite.
pages._comment: Unlocked when a player is summoned in place of Death
